metadata.description: On Christmas night, on his way home from work, Yamada (age 26) picked up the drunk and crying high schooler Chihiro - a boy worried about his attraction to those of the same sex… A straight working man, and a gay high school student. In this long-awaited work from artist Ori Mito, a spontaneous meeting between two people blooms into a romance that transcends gender.
metadata.name: YAMADA AND THE BOY (Yaoi Manga)
